segments.text: I'm observing a kitchen scene right now.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: An adult woman is standing by the sink, drying a plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her attention seems completely absorbed by the task at hand.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But I can clearly see water overflowing the sink basin.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's pouring in a continuous sheet over the counter and onto the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A widening puddle is already forming around her feet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's astonishing that she hasn't noticed it yet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: One of her feet is already submerged in the water!
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I'm really concerned about the potential water damage to the cabinets.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This whole situation just seems so wasteful and messy.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: How can someone be so completely unaware of their surroundings?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's almost comical how oblivious she is to the chaos unfolding.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel a bit sad for the eventual realization she'll have.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The calm outside through the window only highlights the internal disarray.
segments.speaker: PAR
